markdownRemark.html: A reasonably sized mall near the bus station of Malaga. This mall has everything from top end clothing shops to cheap gadget stalls and a nice fruit market. There are a few good eating places and clean toilet facilities which make this a place to pass the time while waiting for a train or bus at the stations opposite. Underground parking is also available.

frontmatter.title: Larios Centre

Underground parking is also available.
tags: Top things to do in Andalusia when it rains
